IOB (Insulin On Board) estimates how much previously injected insulin is still active in your body. This helps avoid insulin stacking — injecting too much because a prior dose is still working.

After you calculate a dose, tap "Inject" to log it. The widget will then subtract the remaining active insulin from future dose recommendations.

The calculation uses linear decay over the configured duration (DIA). For example, with a 4-hour DIA, half the dose is considered active after 2 hours, and none after 4 hours.
